title: Building Privacy-Preserving ML Models on iOS
abstract: Learn how to build machine learning models that respect user privacy while running on-device. We'll explore Core ML, on-device inference, and techniques like differential privacy and federated learning in the context of mobile applications.

title: Real-Time Object Detection with Vision Framework
abstract: Dive deep into building real-time object detection apps using Apple's Vision framework. From setup to optimization, learn how to create responsive AR experiences that identify and track objects in live camera feeds.

title: SwiftData for AI-Powered Apps
abstract: Discover how SwiftData can supercharge your AI applications. We'll cover data modeling for ML features, integrating predictions with persistent storage, and building intelligent apps that learn from user behavior.

title: Integrating LLMs into Mobile Apps
abstract: Explore the patterns and best practices for integrating Large Language Models into mobile applications. From API design to caching strategies, learn how to build responsive apps that leverage AI without compromising battery life or user experience.

title: Fine-Tuning Transformers for Mobile
abstract: Learn how to fine-tune transformer models specifically for mobile deployment. We'll cover model compression, quantization, and optimization techniques that make powerful NLP models run smoothly on resource-constrained devices.

title: Introduction to Large Language Models
abstract: A comprehensive introduction to LLMs, covering transformer architecture, attention mechanisms, training methodologies, and the evolution from GPT to modern language models. Perfect for developers new to the field.

title: Computer Vision: From CNNs to Vision Transformers
abstract: Trace the evolution of computer vision from Convolutional Neural Networks to modern Vision Transformers. Understand the architectural shifts, performance trade-offs, and when to use each approach.

title: Natural Language Processing with Transformers
abstract: Master modern NLP techniques using transformer models. We'll cover text classification, named entity recognition, sentiment analysis, and question answering with practical examples using Hugging Face and custom models.

title: Building RAG Applications
abstract: Learn to build Retrieval-Augmented Generation applications that combine knowledge bases with LLM reasoning. We'll cover vector databases, embedding strategies, prompt engineering, and production deployment patterns.

title: Fine-Tuning and Prompt Engineering Best Practices
abstract: Discover when to fine-tune versus when to use prompt engineering. We'll explore techniques for both approaches, cost-benefit analysis, evaluation methods, and how to choose the right strategy for your use case.

title: Building Scalable Data Pipelines
abstract: Learn to design and implement data pipelines that scale from prototype to production. We'll cover batch and streaming architectures, data quality checks, error handling, and monitoring for reliable data engineering.

title: Real-Time Stream Processing with Kafka
abstract: Master real-time data processing with Apache Kafka. From setting up topics and consumers to building stream processing applications, learn how to handle high-throughput data streams with low latency.

title: Data Warehouse Design for Analytics
abstract: Design data warehouses that enable fast analytics and business intelligence. We'll cover schema design (star vs. snowflake), partitioning strategies, query optimization, and modern cloud warehouse solutions.

title: Vector Databases for AI Applications
abstract: Explore vector databases and their critical role in AI applications. Learn about embeddings, similarity search, ANN algorithms, and how to choose and implement the right vector database for semantic search, recommendations, and RAG.

title: Data Quality and Validation at Scale
abstract: Learn strategies for ensuring data quality in large-scale data systems. We'll cover validation frameworks, anomaly detection, data testing, and building automated quality checks that catch issues before they impact production.

title: Machine Learning Operations (MLOps) in Production
abstract: End-to-end guide to taking ML models from development to production. We'll cover model versioning, CI/CD for ML, monitoring, drift detection, and building reliable ML systems that operate at scale.
